items.title: Detection Field Analysis
items.description: Detection Rules will now automatically asssess common values of the fields returned by a rule hit to help guide in potential tuning of the rule.  Field Analysis results can be viewed on the Event Drawer when viewing a matched Detection in the Event Queue or by opening the Rule Details from the Detection Management page.  This functionality currently only works for Match rules.

items.title: Detections
items.description: - Detection rules will now automatically be assessed every 24 hours.  Currently only works for Match rules.
